message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can't have all the fun, let's give me the bigger share
You can have a bigger share, but not that big!
You're getting desperate, better take this!
You're getting closer, but I'm not giving up yet!
Last chance, take it or leave it!
I'm willing to compromise, but don't expect too much!
You're running out of time, take it or walk away!
I'll give you the last bit of hope, take it!
You're almost out of options, don't make me have to take it all!
